mapper.select: select organization from Members group by organization
select JOB_NAME from (select * from Members where organization=#{organization}) as job group by job_name
select name from Members where JOB_NAME=#{job_name};
select * from Members where organization=#{organization} and JOB_NAME=#{job_name}
select * from Members where organization=#{organization} and JOB_NAME=#{job_name} and name=#{name}
select b.*, case when b.seq = parent_seq then 'true' else 'false' end as favorite from ${board_title} b left join Favorite_Board f on id=#{id} and parent_seq = b.seq and board_title=#{board_title}
select b.*,#{oriBoardTitle} as board_title from Favorite_Board f left join ${board_title} b on parent_seq=b.seq where id=#{id} and board_title=#{board_title} order by write_date desc;
